ing.item: Freshly ground black pepper to taste

directions.step:
from: The White House Chef Cookbook by Rene Verdon
1. Bake the potatoes until done. Half the potatoes lengthwise and scoop out the insides with care.
2. Whip the potato pulp together with sour cream, avocado, salt and pepper.
3. Fill the potato shells, dot with butter, and bake ia a preheated 375 Degree oven for about 10 minutes until lightly browned.
Posted to MM-Recipes Digest V4 #298 by "Maria M. Schaefer" <mariam@startext.net> on Nov 18, 1997
